message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly enhance your life or business. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer represents a significant discount compared to its true worth, providing you with an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a highly favorable rate. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.
